content.text: Match ends, Girona 2, Villarreal 0.
Second Half ends, Girona 2, Villarreal 0.
Foul by Jofre (Girona).
Mateo Musacchio (Villarreal) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Javier Acuña (Girona) hits the bar with a right footed shot from the centre of the box. Assisted by Felipe following a fast break.
Offside, Girona. Luso tries a through ball, but Javier Acuña is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Fernando Cavenaghi (Villarreal) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Bruno Soriano.
Offside, Girona. Javier Acuña tries a through ball, but Jofre is caught offside.
Offside, Villarreal. Javi Venta tries a through ball, but Fernando Cavenaghi is caught offside.

Substitution, Girona. Jofre replaces Jandro.
Foul by Marcos Tébar (Girona).
Cani (Villarreal) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, Villarreal. Walter Pandiani replaces Ikechukwu Uche.
Goal!  Girona 2, Villarreal 0. Jandro (Girona) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Diego Mariño (Villarreal) is shown the yellow card.
Second yellow card to Olof Mellberg (Villarreal) for hand ball.
